name: Logos (itch)
description:
Logos is a puzzle game using a simple rule of brick negating/inverting which leads to
strategically complex situations and needs advanced problem solving abilities.

The application contains two level packs containing 15 levels each. The base pack is there as a tutorial and to help refine your skills in this game world. The "Monastery" pack extends the game with a storyline where your puzzle solving affects the storyline as you advancing the levels.

The game also rewards your effort by giving you 1 Brain Boost Pill (BBP) when you solve a level. These can be used to skip levels on need, but in this case no score is awarded for that level. Score is calculated by using the least possible clicks to solve the level during the shortest amount of time period.

Bring it on!

Only on Android devices:
The player is able to sign in to the Google Play Services to join the global hi-score list with the aggregated score of the finished levels.
